sn1.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn1.1:1.3: Atha kho annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn1.1:1.6: “Yathakatham pana tvam, marisa, appatittham anayuham oghamatari”ti?
sn1.1:1.9: Evam khvaham, avuso, appatittham anayuham oghamatarin”ti.
sn1.1:3.4: “samanunno me sattha”ti bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
